2.2. ä»£ç å—

typescript
/**
 * ä½¿ç”¨Haversineå…¬å¼è®¡ç®—ä¸¤ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´çš„è·ç¦»ï¼ˆå•ä½ï¼šç±³ï¼‰
 * @param origin åŸºå‡†ç‚¹åæ ‡
 * @param target ç›®æ ‡ç‚¹åæ ‡
 * @returns ä¸¤ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´çš„è·ç¦»(ç±³)
 */
const calculateDistance = (origin: Coordinate, target: Coordinate): number => {
    const R = 6371000; // åœ°çƒåŠå¾„ï¼ˆç±³ï¼‰

    const lat1 = toRadians(origin.latitude);
    const lon1 = toRadians(origin.longitude);
    const lat2 = toRadians(target.latitude);
    const lon2 = toRadians(target.longitude);

    // è®¡ç®—çº¬åº¦å’Œç»åº¦çš„å·®å€¼
    const dLat = lat2 - lat1;
    const dLon = lon2 - lon1;

    // Haversineå…¬å¼
    const a =
        Math.sin(dLat / 2) * Math.sin(dLat / 2) +
        Math.cos(lat1) * Math.cos(lat2) *
        Math.sin(dLon / 2) * Math.sin(dLon / 2);
    const c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a));

    // è¿”å›è·ç¦»ï¼ˆç±³ï¼‰
    return R * c;
};
